__e: So are you sure you didn't just imagine...
You know... you know I think that we have imagined everything.
- Yes, sir. I may have imagined it, of course. Because that's what I would have expected to hear.
And maybe she's an uppity, better-than-everyone, superskank.
I've heard from the younger folks of the village, that Sister is pretty, but too stuffy for them, so they're afraid to get too close to her.
I thought, "It's my imagination."So, I went back to washing my hair.
